name: Polar Bear Frenzy
description:
Polar Bear Frenzy!

Get home with the fish for your family! avoid the pesky thieving penguins. they will stop at nothing to steal your fish.

controls: left and right arrow keys for movement up arrow to jump down arrow for claw attack!

Polar Bear Frenzy v 1.4.5 by myke d. sprites/tiles/background art by zombcool seagull sprites by zombcool background music by Abstraction Jump, Hit, and penguin death sounds by Little Robot Sound Factory
reel sound: Memoraphile
splash sound: jcpmcdonald
casting sound: juskiddink
seagull sounds: Rango Mango
bear sounds: the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service
